title: Enhancing customer order monitoring: developing a database infrastructure and interactive data visualization dashboard
abstract: API Ltd. is a business that still performs its daily operations manually. Due to the growing number of customer demands, they realized the need to create a new operating system to reduce errors and accomplish orders. In order to keep track of the operations within the company, one of the methods that can be utilized to tackle this problem is to develop a local database and local information management. The company can easily keep track of each order thanks to the database and dashboard.
contributors: Karina Agustin, S.T., M.B.A. (Advisor 1); Prayonne Adi S.T., M.MT. (Examination Committee 1); Indriati Njoto Bisono (Examination Committee 2)
